name: Trawl-survey data from the Pipeta Expedition in the Adriatic Sea (Mediterranean) collected in 1982
description: The âPipeta programmeâ (named after the Italian commercialtrawler used; 300 HP; LOA = 26 m) was started in 1982 by theLaboratory of Marine Biology and Fisheries (LMBF, Italy) andtheInstitute of Oceanography and Fisheries (IOF, Croatia). The expedition was afishery-independent trawl-survey of the demersal communities using a bottom otter-trawl net (wing mesh-size: 55 mm; cod-endmesh-size: 22 mm; foot-rope length: 41 m; head-rope length: 32 m). The survey was successively called GRUND programmeand ended in 2007.
